title: Abominable
description: A group of misfits encounter a young Yeti named Everest, and they set off to reunite the magical creature with his family on the mountain of his namesake.

reviews.text: This movie was worse than the reviews said, if thats possible.
This movie is very painful. Everything was wrong. The director is obviously either new to the industry or just sucks in general.
this is a combination of Rear Window and Sasquatch, just a great movie.
